English: to think up every possible method (idiom); to devise ways and means
francais: (expr. idiom.) essayer de trouver tous les moyens possibles

e: `如~：「`他~`想方設法~`要得~`到~`這個~`職位~，`結果~`依然~`無法~`如願~。」

to try this, that and the other
